existing_features.title: Update the central contact phone numbers to include the India country code prefix so all UI locations that render these numbers show them in the format "+91 7011090796" and "+91 9212374300" (including WhatsApp primary/secondary and phone1/phone2).
Update the standalone (non-React) landing page contact numbers to include the "+91 " prefix everywhere they are displayed.

new_feature_requests.summary: Prefix all displayed phone numbers with country code +91 (e.g., +91 7011090796, +91 9212374300)
Ensure phone/WhatsApp/SMS deep links continue to work correctly after adding the "+91 " prefix to stored numbers (tel:, sms:, and https://wa.me/...).
